title: Event Relationship Descriptor
description: Used by the UPS system to assign the specific schema that will used for the timeSeriesEvents field which is part of the union view of a class. If not supplied, the system today will default to the unified ExperienceEvent.

_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: The unique identifier for the schema descriptor. This property is required when the descriptor is defined outside of the applicable schema, but is optional when applied via 'meta:descriptors'.

_type.title: Type
_type.description: The type of descriptor this object represents.

sourceSchema.title: Source Schema
sourceSchema.description: The source schema this descriptor applies to. This property is required when the descriptor is defined outside of the applicable schema, but is optional when applied via 'meta:descriptors'

sourceProperty.title: Source Property
sourceProperty.description: When present, the property of the source schema to which this descriptor applies. This value is a JSON Pointer, applied to an instance of an object described by `xdm:sourceSchema`.

destinationSchema.title: Destination Schema
destinationSchema.description: The destination schema this descriptor applies to

destinationVersion.title: Destination Version
destinationVersion.description: When present, major version being referenced.
